description: Terminal classification system for the Terminal Hacking subsystem of System Bypass skill

terminalTypes.name: Civilian Data Port
terminalTypes.description: Basic data terminals found in residential areas and public spaces. Minimal security, no countermeasures.
terminalTypes.flavorText: A relic of everyday life Before - the blinking cursor waits patiently for commands it may never receive.

terminalTypes.name: Corporate Mainframe
terminalTypes.description: Business-grade terminals with standard security protocols. Features passive trace countermeasures.
terminalTypes.flavorText: The corporations of the World Before kept meticulous records. Some secrets are worth more than gold.

terminalTypes.name: Security Hub
terminalTypes.description: Security station terminals with active defense systems. ICE will attack intruders.
terminalTypes.flavorText: Built to protect the protectors. The watchful eye of the Old World still blinks in the darkness.

terminalTypes.name: Military Server
terminalTypes.description: Military-grade servers with hardened defenses. Features aggressive countermeasures with lethal backup.
terminalTypes.flavorText: The military-industrial complex left its fingerprints everywhere. Some doors should remain closed.

terminalTypes.name: Jötun Archive
terminalTypes.description: Ancient giant-craft terminals of incomprehensible complexity. Neural ICE can destroy minds.
terminalTypes.flavorText: The Jötun built for eternity. Their archives hold knowledge beyond mortal comprehension—and dangers to match.

terminalTypes.name: Glitched Manifold
terminalTypes.description: Corrupted terminals where reality itself is unstable. DC varies based on glitch cycle phase.
terminalTypes.flavorText: The screen flickers with images that haven't happened yet—or perhaps never will. Reality bleeds at the edges.

securityLevels.name: Password Only
securityLevels.description: Basic password authentication. The simplest security measure.

securityLevels.name: Biometric
securityLevels.description: Biometric verification required. May include fingerprint, retinal, or voice recognition.

securityLevels.name: Multi-Factor
securityLevels.description: Multiple authentication methods required. Combines password, biometric, and possession checks.

securityLevels.name: Jötun-Locked
securityLevels.description: Ancient giant-craft authentication beyond mortal understanding. May require neural synchronization.

dataTypes.name: Public Records
dataTypes.description: Publicly available information with no restricted access.

dataTypes.name: Internal Documents
dataTypes.description: Internal organization documents requiring authorized access.

dataTypes.name: Classified
dataTypes.description: Sensitive information with restricted access protocols.

dataTypes.name: Archived / Hidden
dataTypes.description: Deeply buried or deliberately hidden data requiring administrative privileges.

corruptionModifiers.description: Minor corruption causing visual artifacts and unpredictable behavior
Significant corruption warping the terminal's responses and data integrity
Severe corruption with reality-distorting effects and potential psychic feedback
